channel.title: Upgrade Guides on Timber Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Upgrade Guides on Timber Docs

item.title: Upgrade to 1.0
item.description: A significant part of this 1.0 release is removing lots of deprecated functions and methods that go back to the earliest designs for Timber in early 2013. Should I upgrade? Maybe. Read on: I have a legacy site If you wrote a theme in 2014, it’s running fine and the development of the site has concluded: stop right there! Do not upgrade! While there are some slight performance benefits (and not having the warning light on the plugin dashboard) it’s not worth it to you.
